reviews.content: It is a really cool tweak that works really well
Works perfectly for flashlight operation. However when using flash while taking video, only the amber lights comes on. Photos with flash operate normally

Actually it's an amazig tweak that incluidesna hardware feature. Remember activate the CC toggle to use it.

6s iOS
12.4
Working on my iPhone 11 Pro on iOS 14.2 using unc0ver.
Very neat tweak for taking advantage of the hardware on your phone that apple otherwise has locked down. Great tweak for every iphone 5s-xs max
Sometimes it does respring when enabled
Enable CC toggle then then turn on flashlight, device resprings and after toggling on again and turning on flashlight, light is amber.  Works flawlessly.

Basic functionality working on iOS 14.

„Swiping up gesture“ to combine all LEDs functional but visualization broken (just iOS 14).
It would be nice if it has the buttons to switch between the led type when you long press the torchlight (like the ones when inside when you long press the brightness slider)
